articles.title: Royal Ballet appoints first-ever Principal from Wales - Daily Mail
articles.description: William Bracewell, 31, from Swansea, arrived at the company in 2017 from the Birmingham Royal Ballet. He told The Sunday Times when he started ballet he told friends he did martial arts classes.
articles.content:
